com.example.denis.myapplication

Interface IFaceLocator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IDetector
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CVFaceDetector, GmsFaceDetector, OpenCvFaceDetector

    public interface IFaceLocator
extends IDetector
    This interface is for classes that detect faces and locate Landmarks: eyes,mouth and face borders
